title: Permeable Pavers & Drainage
intro: Solve standing water issues and meet City of Austin impervious cover limits with smart, drainage-focused paving.
highlights: Interlocking permeable pavers with rapid infiltration layers
French drains and dry creek beds integrated into design
Erosion control for sloped driveways and walkways

avgCost.notes: Cost per square foot. Permeable systems require deeper base aggregate layers than standard patios.

faqs.q: Does this count against my impervious cover limit?
faqs.a: Typically, properly installed permeable systems are calculated at a different ratio (often 50-100% permeable credits) depending on your specific municipality's code.

faqs.q: Will weeds grow through the pavers?
faqs.a: Installers use specialized joint aggregate that discourages weed growth while still allowing water to pass through.
